title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Field Liaison Officer Posts
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Field Liaison Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., MSW can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the ...
